pages.title: Orbital Scan #0076
pages.text: $(bold)Subject: Acheronite Tool Applications$()$(br2)Refined Acheronite is harder than diamond and colder than ORSA command's decision to leave you down there. Naturally, orbital engineering recommends making weapons.$(br2)Acheronite tools match $(bold)netherite-tier durability$() and use standard patterns with Refined Acheronite and sticks.$(br2)$(italic)"Does the blade cauterize on contact?"$(br)"Send someone down to check."$(br)"...noted."$()

pages.title: Acheronite Pickaxe
pages.text: Mines through frozen obsidian like butter. Very cold butter.

pages.title: Acheronite Blade
pages.text: Enemies shatter on impact. Morale also shatters. Mostly morale.

pages.title: Acheronite Axe
pages.text: For chopping dead trees. And anything else that looks at you wrong.

pages.title: Acheronite Shovel
pages.text: Digs through permafrost. A shovel that matches the terrain's hostility.
